author: George Dobell
title: Iain O'Brien launches fundraising appeal in bid to be reunited with family
description: Retired seamer stuck in New Zealand as airlines cancel flights due to COVID-19 pandemic | ESPNcricinfo.com
content:
Iain O'Brien, the former New Zealand fast bowler, has launched a funding page in a bid to return to his family.
O'Brien, who now lives with his wife and two daughters near Matlock in England, was visiting his parents in New Zealand when the COVID-19 (novel c… [+1675 chars]
